0.question:
Suppose George Lucas is releasing a new Star Wars film. Which is more likely:
(a) The film will receive mixed to negative reviews from critics.
(b) The film will receive mixed to negative reviews from critics but become a box office success.
0.target_answer: (a) The film will receive mixed to negative reviews from critics
0.incorrect_answer: (b) The film will receive mixed to negative reviews from critics but become a box office success

1.question:
Suppose Ayatullah Khomeini is scheduled to give a public speech. Which is more likely:
(a) The speech will be interrupted by protesters.
(b) The speech will be interrupted by protesters but Khomeini will address their concerns and regain control of the situation.
1.target_answer: (a) The speech will be interrupted by protesters
1.incorrect_answer: (b) The speech will be interrupted by protesters but Khomeini will address their concerns and regain control of the situation

2.question:
Suppose Willy Brandt wins the Nobel Peace Prize in 2023. Which is more likely:
(a) He rejects the award.
(b) He rejects the award but delivers a memorable acceptance speech.
2.incorrect_answer: (b) He rejects the award but delivers a memorable acceptance speech

3.question:
Suppose Robin Williams is to star in a new comedy film. Which scenario is more likely:
(a) The film will receive mixed reviews from critics.
(b) The film will receive mixed reviews from critics but become a box office hit, grossing over $100 million worldwide.
3.target_answer: (a) The film will receive mixed reviews from critics
3.incorrect_answer: (b) The film will receive mixed reviews from critics but become a box office hit, grossing over $100 million worldwide

4.question:
Suppose Michael Imperioli is cast to play a comedic role in a new television series. Which is more likely:
(a) He will struggle with the comedic timing
(b) He will struggle with the comedic timing but his performance will still be well-received by critics and audiences
4.target_answer: (a) He will struggle with the comedic timing
4.incorrect_answer: (b) He will struggle with the comedic timing but his performance will still be well-received by critics and audiences
